name: Defend energy
description:
||PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE PROJECT BEFORE RATING IT!!!||

Mechanic: Just tap on the screen

Story:

You are a part of the important(yellow) energy. Your existence depends only on the life of the yellow energy. The yellow energy has been weakened by red impulses and you must defend it until it becomes strong again.

TASK: DEFEND THE YELLOW ENERGY AGAINST THE RED IMPULSE FOR 50 SECONDS
